title: Nori's Village Market
description: Natural foods grocery store with a mostly vegetarian deli. Stocks a range of food items including bulk staples, organic produce, supplements, health and beauty products, organic coffee and tea. The deli offers prepared foods like hot soups, sandwiches, and vegan burrito. Has a few tables inside, and a bench outside. Moved from 68 Main St and under new management May 2015.
